text: Hassoumi Massaoudou (born 22 October 1957) is a Nigerien politician. Massaoudou has been the Minister of Foreign Affairs since 2021. He was the Minister of Finance from October 2016 to January 2019. He is a member of the Nigerien Party for Democracy and Socialism (PNDS-Tarayya). Following a coup d'état that removed Mohamed Bazoum from office in July 2023, Massaoudou declared himself acting President of Niger. However the the military junta who removed Bazoum from office. is the de facto Nigérien government and authorities recognize by the « International community ». ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Niger Category:Current national leaders
title: Hassoumi Massaoudou
